audioDynamics.title: Audio Dynamics 101: What Is a Compressor?
audioDynamics.info: Learn what compressors are, what situations they are used for, and how to pick the right compressor to achieve your desired sound.

bottomCards.title: Multiband Compression Basics
bottomCards.info: Learn everything you need to know about multiband compression, including what it is, when to reach for it, and how to set it up for mixing or mastering.

bottomCards.title: How to Create Better Transitions in Your Mix
bottomCards.info: Learn how to get better transitions in your songs and mixes by creating contrast in your arrangement, adding tension between sections, and automating effects.

bottomCards.alt: Image of man facing towards a microphone
bottomCards.title: Vocal Mixing 101: Free Vocal Doubler Plug-in and Tips for Mixing Vocals
bottomCards.info: Take your vocal mixing skills to the next level with an overview of six intuitive plug-ins for mixing vocals. Learn to effectively use each one and download a free plug-in, the Vocal Doubler.
